contribution_desc: Mostly about the concept of cross-media use and pathways. Introduces general concepts, and later introduces proof-of-concept.
devices_included: Phone; TV; Desktop computer; Laptop; Tablet
crossdevice_def:
Cross-Media definition:
- Crossmedia involves more than one medium
- Crossmedia aims at an integrated production
- Content is delivered on multiple devices: PCs, mobiles, TV, iTV
- More than one medium is needed to support one message/story/goal; 
- The common message/story/goal is spread on the different platforms and the supporting interaction can take place in these different platforms.
